meta.sampleQuery: select text from {table} where text.key1 = "http://farm" and text.key3 = ".static.flickr.com/" and text.key5 = "/" and text.key7 = "_" and text.key9 = ".jpg" and (text.key2, text.key4, text.key6, text.key8) in (select farm, server, id, secret from flickr.photos.search where text = "fish");
